descriptions.overviewDescription: Cluster overview and runtime health at a glance.
descriptions.metricsDescription: Explore raw metric points with filters and trend charts.
descriptions.agentsDescription: Manage active agents and whitelist-based access.
descriptions.whitelistDescription: Manage trusted agents and their discovery tokens.
descriptions.alertsDescription: Track active alerts and take response actions quickly.
descriptions.alertDetailDescription: View full alert context, timeline, and response actions.
descriptions.alertsHistoryDescription: Review historical alert events and handling records.
descriptions.alertsRulesDescription: Configure alert rules, thresholds, and silence policy.
descriptions.certificatesDescription: Inspect certificate inventory and expiration timeline.
descriptions.certificateDomainsDescription: Manage domain list and certificate check scheduling.
descriptions.certificateStatusDescription: Review latest certificate check status by domain.
descriptions.notificationsDescription: Configure delivery channels, recipients, and test messages.
descriptions.notificationLogsDescription: Review delivery logs, status summary, and failure reasons.
descriptions.notificationChannelDetailDescription: View full channel configuration, recipients, and system-config binding.
descriptions.silenceWindowsDescription: Set silence windows to suppress planned alert noise.
descriptions.systemDescription: Tune runtime configuration and manage storage cleanup.
descriptions.profileDescription: Update account and credential security settings.
descriptions.agentDetailDescription: Inspect real-time metrics and health for this agent.
descriptions.systemDictionariesDescription: Manage system dictionary types and key-value mappings.

layout.title: Alerts & Rules
layout.description: Monitor active alerts, review history, and manage alert rules.

active.title: Active Alerts
active.emptyDescription: All systems operating within normal parameters.
active.searchPlaceholder: Search by Agent ID or message...
active.noChartData: Not enough data for trend chart
active.detailDialogDescription: View full alert details and response timeline
active.detailNotFoundDescription: No alert found for ID {id}. It may have expired or been cleaned up.

history.title: Alert History
history.description: Review past alert events and their resolution status.
history.emptyDescription: No historical alert events match the current filters.
history.filtersDescription: Filter historical alerts by agent, severity, status, or time range
history.resultsDescription: Showing historical alert events that match current filters
history.resultsDescriptionWithCount: Showing historical alert events that match current filters ({filtered} / {total})

rules.title: Alert Rules
rules.description: Define and manage alert triggers and thresholds.
rules.tableDescription: View and manage all alert rules.
rules.dialogCreateDesc: Define a new monitoring rule with metric thresholds.
rules.deleteDialogDescription: This rule will be permanently removed and cannot be recovered. Are you sure you want to continue?
rules.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this rule?
rules.emptyDescription: Create your first alert rule to start monitoring.

agents.title: Agent List
agents.description: View status and last seen time, with quick link to detail page
agents.currentPageDescription: Default {limit} items per page, sorted by last seen

agentDetail.title: Agent: {agentId}
agentDetail.notFoundDescription: Please verify the Agent ID or return to the list page
agentDetail.rawDescription: Useful for debugging metric name mapping and labels

whitelist.title: Whitelist
whitelist.description: Manage allowed agents and access tokens
whitelist.addDialogDescription: Create a whitelist entry and get a new token on success.
whitelist.fieldDescriptionPlaceholder: Optional note to help identify this agent
whitelist.listDescription: API pagination: limit={limit}, supports CRUD and token regeneration
whitelist.searchPlaceholder: Search by Agent ID or description...
whitelist.tokenDialogCreateDescription: Please save the token for "{agentId}" now. It is shown only once.
whitelist.tokenDialogRegenerateDescription: The old token for "{agentId}" is now invalid. Update your deployment config.
whitelist.tokenDialogHint: Copy and store it securely now. It will not be shown again after closing.
whitelist.toastUpdateNotFound: Agent not found or already removed
whitelist.toastRemoveNotFound: Agent not found or already removed
whitelist.toastTokenCopyFailed: Copy failed. Please copy it manually
whitelist.regenerateDialogDescription: A new token will be generated for "{agentId}" and the old token will be invalidated immediately.
whitelist.deleteDialogDescription: After removal, "{agentId}" can no longer connect. Continue?

overview.title: Certificate Management
overview.description: Manage SSL/TLS certificates and monitored domains
overview.filtersDescription: Filter by domain (current page), issuer, IP, and expiry days
overview.tableDescription: {limit} items per page, sorted by expiry ascending
overview.toastChainError: Failed to load certificate chain details
overview.tableEmptyHint: Add domains in "Monitored Domains" first to see certificate assets.

domains.title: Domain Management
domains.description: Manage domain list and certificate check schedules
domains.addDialogDescription: The domain will be checked automatically after creation
domains.batchDialogDescription: Use comma or newline as separator
domains.filtersDescription: Filter by domain and enabled status
domains.tableDescription: {limit} items per page, sorted by created time desc
domains.toastInvalidNumber: Port and interval must be non-negative integers
domains.toastBatchEmpty: Please enter at least one domain
domains.toastCheckAllPartial: Global check finished with {failed} failures out of {total}
domains.toastDeleteNotFound: Domain not found or already deleted
domains.deleteDialogDescription: Monitoring for {domain} will be stopped. Continue?
domains.autoCreateDialogDescription: Domain {domain} is not monitored yet. Create it now and run a check?
domains.autoCreateAdvancedHint: Optional: set port, check interval and note before creating
domains.autoCreateAdvancedResetDialogDescription: This will clear {count} remembered advanced parameter value(s).
domains.historyDialogDescription: Recent certificate check records for this domain
domains.tableEmptyHint: Add a single domain or use batch import to onboard quickly.

status.title: Check Status
status.description: View latest certificate check status for all domains
status.tableDescription: {limit} items per page, sorted by checked time desc
status.tableEmptyHint: Add domains in "Monitored Domains" and run checks first.
status.tableEmptyFilteredHint: Try clearing or changing the search keyword.

detail.ipAddressesDescription: IP addresses associated with this certificate

metrics.title: Metrics
metrics.description: Query and analyze raw agent metric data
metrics.queryConditionsDescription: Select agent, metric name, and time range to load data
metrics.rawPointsDescription: Details of the most recent query result
metrics.toastCopyLinkError: Failed to copy link, please copy from address bar manually
metrics.toastMissingCustomRange: Please choose both start and end time
metrics.toastInvalidCustomRange: Start time cannot be later than end time

notifications.layoutDescription: Configure channels, recipients, and delivery connectivity checks.
notifications.title: Notification Channels
notifications.description: Manage channel configs, recipients, and test delivery from notification APIs.
notifications.searchPlaceholder: Search name, type, description, or recipient
notifications.tableDescription: The list shows key fields only. Open details for full configuration.
notifications.tableEmptyHint: Create your first channel to start routing alerts.
notifications.dialogCreateDescription: Create a channel and run delivery test right away.
notifications.dialogEditDescription: Update config, minimum severity, and recipients.
notifications.fieldSystemConfigEmpty: No available system config for this type, create one in System Settings first
notifications.systemConfigDisabledWarning: Selected system config is disabled. Please verify delivery behavior.
notifications.fieldRecipientsPlaceholder: Comma or newline separated, e.g. admin@example.com
notifications.fieldConfigAutoHint: For this channel type, fill in the structured fields below. The system will generate JSON automatically.
notifications.configFieldDingTalkAtUserIdsHint: Retrieve member UserIds dynamically from System Management or API before filling this field.
notifications.toastDeleteNotFound: Channel not found or already removed
notifications.toastSystemConfigRequired: This channel type must bind a system config
notifications.toastConfigInvalid: Invalid JSON config, please check and try again
notifications.recipientsDialogHint: Comma/newline separated. Empty values are removed and duplicates are deduplicated.
notifications.deleteDialogDescription: Deleting channel "{name}" will stop all related deliveries. Continue?
notifications.detailDescription: View complete configuration and delivery targets for this notification channel.
notifications.detailNotFoundDescription: No notification channel found for ID {id}. It may have been deleted.
notifications.detailConfigHint: The content below is from channel config JSON.
notifications.logsDescription: Query delivery records by channel, status, rule, and time range.
notifications.logsTableDescription: View delivery status, latency, and error details by channel.
notifications.logsDetailDescription: View full delivery details and request/response payloads for this log entry.
notifications.logsDetailNotFoundDescription: No log record found for ID {id}.
notifications.silenceDescription: Configure silence windows to suppress alert notifications during maintenance.
notifications.silenceSearchPlaceholder: Search by window ID, time, or recurrence
notifications.silenceTableDescription: Create, filter, and delete silence windows.
notifications.silenceTableEmptyHint: Create a silence window for your maintenance period.
notifications.silenceCreateDialogDescription: Suppress notifications within a time range, optionally with recurrence.
notifications.silenceDeleteDialogDescription: Deleting window {id} takes effect immediately. Continue?
notifications.silenceToastDeleteNotFound: Silence window not found or already removed
notifications.silenceToastTimeRequired: Please select start and end time
notifications.silenceToastTimeOrderInvalid: End time must be later than start time
notifications.silenceEditDialogDescription: Update window {id} by creating a new one and replacing it.
notifications.silenceFieldReplaceOriginalHint: When enabled, the original window is deleted after new window creation succeeds.
notifications.silenceToastReplaceDeleteWarning: New window created, but failed to delete original window {id}. Please remove it manually
notifications.silenceFilterOriginOnlyHint: Show windows created by replace/clone only
notifications.silenceToastImportOriginsEmpty: No valid origin marks found in file

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Manage your account information and access tokens
profile.tokenWarning: This token grants full administrative access. Keep it secure and never share it in public environments.

system.title: System Settings
system.description: Manage system configuration, storage, and security
system.dictionaryQuickDescription: Jump directly to dictionary entries or dictionary types by module.
system.toastPasswordRequired: Please fill in all password fields
system.confirmCleanup: Are you sure you want to cleanup storage? Expired data partitions will be purged.
system.systemConfigDescription: Manage system-level configs like notification senders with create, edit, enable, and delete actions.
system.systemConfigSearchPlaceholder: Search by name, config key, type, or description
system.systemConfigDialogCreateDescription: Create a system config that can be referenced by notification channels.
system.systemConfigDialogEditDescription: Update config content and enabled status.
system.systemConfigFieldConfigJsonPlaceholder: Provide valid JSON, such as SMTP or SMS gateway parameters
system.systemConfigDeleteDialogReferencedHint: This config is still referenced by {count} notification channel(s). Unbind them before deleting.
system.systemConfigToastDeleteError: Failed to delete system config (it may be referenced by notification channels)
system.systemConfigToastDeleteReferenced: This config is still referenced by {count} notification channel(s) and cannot be deleted
system.systemConfigToastToggleError: Failed to update system config status
system.dictionaryDescription: Manage dictionary entries by type with create, update, delete, and enable controls.
system.dictionaryTypeEmpty: No dictionary types yet, please create one first
system.dictionaryTypeDeleteDisabledWithItems: This type still has {count} entries and cannot be deleted
system.dictionaryTypeTableDescription: Manage type labels and entry counts with quick select, edit, and delete actions.
system.dictionarySearchPlaceholder: Search key, label, value, or description
system.dictionaryEmptyHint: Create your first dictionary entry with "New Entry".
system.dictionaryTypeCreateDialogDescription: Use dictionary types to group entries and power enum-like options in business configs.
system.dictionaryCreateDialogDescription: Created entries can be used in dropdowns, rule configs, and other typed scenarios.
system.dictionaryFieldExtraJsonHint: Provide a valid JSON string for extended configuration.
system.dictionaryToastTypeInvalid: Selected dictionary type does not exist, please refresh and try again
system.dictionaryToastNoTypeToCreateEntry: Please create a dictionary type before creating entries
system.dictionaryToastSortOrderInvalid: Sort order must be an integer
system.dictionaryTypeToastUpdateNotFound: Dictionary type not found or already removed
system.dictionaryTypeToastDeleteNotFound: Dictionary type not found or already removed
system.dictionaryTypeToastDeleteConflict: Dictionary type still contains entries and cannot be deleted
system.dictionaryToastCreateConflict: Dictionary key already exists under this type
system.dictionaryToastUpdateNotFound: Dictionary entry not found or already removed
system.dictionaryToastDeleteForbidden: Built-in dictionary entries cannot be deleted
system.dictionaryToastDeleteNotFound: Dictionary entry not found or already removed
system.dictionaryToastSystemItemUndeletable: Built-in dictionary entries cannot be deleted
